mapper.select: /* [iCUBE][MSSQL] AnguCode.getEmpInfoI_Select */ SELECT TOP 1 B.CO_CD AS erpCompSeq /* iCUBE 회사 코드 */ , B.CO_NM AS erpCompName /* iCUBE 회사 명칭 */ , B.FR_DT AS erpCompFrDate /* iCUBE 기수 시작일 */ , B.TO_DT AS erpCompToDate /* iCUBE 기수 종료일 */ , B.GISU AS erpCompGisu /* iCUBE 기수 */ , C.DIV_CD AS erpBizSeq /* iCUBE 사업장 코드 */ , C.DIV_NM AS erpBizName /* iCUBE 사업장 명칭 */ , D.SECT_CD AS erpSectSeq /* iCUBE 부문 코드 */ , D.SECT_NM AS erpSectName /* iCUBE 부문 명칭 */ , D.DEPT_CD AS erpDeptSeq /* iCUBE 부서 코드 */ , D.DEPT_NM AS erpDeptName /* iCUBE 부서 명칭 */ , A.EMP_CD AS erpEmpSeq /* iCUBE 사원 번호 */ , A.KOR_NM AS erpEmpName /* iCUBE 사원 명 */ FROM ( SELECT CO_CD , DEPT_CD , EMP_CD , KOR_NM FROM ZA_EMP_DAIKIN WHERE CO_CD = #{erpCompSeq} AND EMP_CD = #{erpEmpSeq} ) A INNER JOIN ( SELECT CO_CD , CO_NM , FR_DT , TO_DT , GISU FROM ZA_COMPANY_DAIKIN WHERE CO_CD = #{erpCompSeq} ) B ON A.CO_CD = B.CO_CD INNER JOIN ( SELECT CO_CD , DIV_CD , DIV_NM FROM ZA_DIV_DAIKIN WHERE CO_CD = #{erpCompSeq} ) C ON A.CO_CD = C.CO_CD INNER JOIN ( SELECT CO_CD , DIV_CD , SECT_CD , SECT_NM , DEPT_CD , DEPT_NM FROM ZA_DEPT_DAIKIN WHERE CO_CD = #{erpCompSeq} ) D ON A.CO_CD = D.CO_CD AND A.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD AND C.DIV_CD = D.DIV_CD

SELECT TOP 1 B.CO_CD AS erpCompSeq , B.CO_NM AS erpCompName , B.FR_DT AS erpCompFrDate , B.TO_DT AS erpCompToDate , B.GISU AS erpCompGisu , C.DIV_CD AS erpBizSeq , C.DIV_NM AS erpBizName , D.SECT_CD AS erpSectSeq , D.SECT_NM AS erpSectName , D.DEPT_CD AS erpDeptSeq , D.DEPT_NM AS erpDeptName , A.EMP_CD AS erpEmpSeq , A.KOR_NM AS erpEmpName FROM ( SELECT CO_CD , DEPT_CD , EMP_CD , KOR_NM FROM ZA_EMP_DAIKIN WHERE CO_CD = #{erpCompSeq} AND EMP_CD = #{erpEmpSeq} ) A INNER JOIN ( SELECT CO_CD , CO_NM , FR_DT , TO_DT , GISU FROM ZA_COMPANY_DAIKIN WHERE CO_CD = #{erpCompSeq} ) B ON A.CO_CD = B.CO_CD INNER JOIN ( SELECT CO_CD , DIV_CD , DIV_NM FROM ZA_DIV_DAIKIN WHERE CO_CD = #{erpCompSeq} ) C ON A.CO_CD = C.CO_CD INNER JOIN ( SELECT CO_CD , DIV_CD , SECT_CD , SECT_NM , DEPT_CD , DEPT_NM FROM ZA_DEPT_DAIKIN WHERE CO_CD = #{erpCompSeq} ) D ON A.CO_CD = D.CO_CD AND A.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD AND C.DIV_CD = D.DIV_CD

SELECT C.ASSTN_EXPITM_TAXITM_CODE, C.ASSTN_EXPITM_NM, C.ASSTN_TAXITM_NM FROM ANBOJO_DDTLBZINFO_PFRS B LEFT OUTER JOIN ANBOJO_SBGTCDINFO C ON B.ASSTN_TAXITM_CODE = C.ASSTN_EXPITM_TAXITM_CODE WHERE B.BSNSYEAR = #{BSNSYEAR} AND B.DDTLBZ_ID = #{DDTLBZ_ID} AND C.FSYR = #{FSYR} AND C.ASSTN_EXPITM_TAXITM_SE_CODE = '002' GROUP BY C.ASSTN_EXPITM_TAXITM_CODE, C.ASSTN_EXPITM_NM, C.ASSTN_TAXITM_NM ORDER BY C.ASSTN_EXPITM_TAXITM_CODE, C.ASSTN_EXPITM_NM, C.ASSTN_TAXITM_NM

SELECT D.CMMN_CODE , E.CMMN_CODE_NM , D.CMMN_DETAIL_CODE , D.CMMN_DETAIL_CODE_NM FROM ( SELECT BSNSYEAR , DDTLBZ_ID , ASSTN_TAXITM_CODE , FNRSC_SE_CODE FROM ANBOJO_DDTLBZINFO_PFRS WHERE DDTLBZ_ID = #{DDTLBZ_ID} AND BSNSYEAR = #{BSNSYEAR} AND ASSTN_TAXITM_CODE = #{ASSTN_TAXITM_CODE} ) C LEFT OUTER JOIN ANBOJO_CMMN_CODE_D D ON D.SYS_SE_CODE = '001' AND D.CMMN_CODE = '1220' AND C.FNRSC_SE_CODE = D.CMMN_DETAIL_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ANBOJO_CMMN_CODE E ON D.SYS_SE_CODE = E.SYS_SE_CODE AND D.CMMN_CODE = E.CMMN_CODE
